3d88e69c-207b-4ab4-8d27-70c45cead285.title: Signature
3d88e69c-207b-4ab4-8d27-70c45cead285.text:
If you have any further questions, feel free to post them here.

Best Regards,
Name [Company]

c6401ef1-7b21-462b-9412-d13d04b4215c.title: Customization
c6401ef1-7b21-462b-9412-d13d04b4215c.text:
Unfortunately this is not possible by default and would require a major theme customization.
However, if you are in the need of this particular functionality/feature/modification I can offer you our customization service, which will be glad to take on this job for you and modify everything to your likings.

e5d50078-4268-414a-98ac-8cd334946fe9.title: Plugins Check
e5d50078-4268-414a-98ac-8cd334946fe9.text: Please deactivate all your plugins and see if the issue persists. If it is gone you can activate one plugin after the next always followed by a quick check if the issue returns. That way you can identify the culprit.

57d099e9-c423-4eb6-bae1-5c840785226c.title: CSS Customization
57d099e9-c423-4eb6-bae1-5c840785226c.text:
please add the following CSS to the Custom CSS Field in your Theme Options:

.sample-selector {display: none;}
